author: tomaz
msg: Add force_ipv4 argument to _wait_until_running and default it to True.
This will make Libcloud ignore IPv6 addresses when using deploy_node.
Contributed by Jay Doane, part of LIBCLOUD-200.

author: bodewig
msg: LOG4NET-331 gracefully handle IIS7 integrated mode's behavior when request is not available (other modes and versions simply return null for the request property)

author: tomaz
msg: Fix a bug with invalid base64 string decoding in multiple drivers which occured
when using Python 3. Part of LIBCLOUD-204.

author: zhangjf
msg: Fix issue #118851: sc crashed when paste table data in a cell from excel
